title: Data Scientist

description:
About ClosedLoop:

ClosedLoop.ai is healthcare’s data science platform. Purpose-built and dedicated to healthcare, we make it easy for healthcare organizations (HCOs) to use AI to improve outcomes and reduce costs. Our platform combines an intuitive end-to-end machine learning platform with a comprehensive library of healthcare-specific features and model templates.

We’re the leader in delivering unbiased accuracy and explainable AI healthcare solutions. Regardless of whether our customers have extensive data science teams or are just starting out, our products are engineered to help them harness the power of AI to improve patient outcomes, achieve clinical excellence, and enhance business success.

What sets us apart is our commitment and ability to deliver AI solutions at-scale in healthcare. We’re ready to help change the world. Are you? Come join us!

About the Team:

Built and based in Austin, Texas, we are a small but mighty team of “Closers” who are passionate about changing the future of healthcare. With numerous accolades in our trophy case, we have been repeatedly recognized by the Austin Business Journal as a “Best Places to Work” and Built In as a “Best Startups” for our culture and employee-centric programming. We believe in empowering our teams to do their best work, offer generous employee benefits that include 100% paid medical insurance for employees and their dependents, flexible PTO, paid parental leave, 401k, and ongoing learning and team building opportunities.

We believe that diverse teams are stronger teams and understand that building for the future includes embracing and honoring different backgrounds and experiences. Doing so creates the foundation for our ability to build systems that drive unbiased outcomes.

We strive to create a supportive team high in rigor, with a constant improvement mindset. We believe that teams high in trust innovate faster and better, collaborate more effectively, and love their work more. If this sounds like a place where you can see yourself building for a future that transforms healthcare, we’d love for you to join us!

About the Role:

Are you passionate about leveraging data science to revolutionize healthcare outcomes? We're seeking a skilled Data Scientist to join our team, where you'll spearhead the development of predictive models using cutting-edge machine learning and statistical methodologies via the ClosedLoop platform. Your mission will be to collaborate closely with healthcare stakeholders, uncovering key business challenges and tailoring analytical solutions to drive impactful results. From optimizing resource allocation to improving patient outcomes, your expertise will be instrumental in transforming complex healthcare data sets into actionable insights. If you're ready to make a difference in healthcare by translating data into tangible improvements, join us in this exciting role.

What you'll do:
• Develop predictive models to forecast healthcare trends, optimize resource allocation, and improve patient outcomes, utilizing machine learning and statistical methodologies via the ClosedLoop platform.
• Collaborate closely with healthcare stakeholders to identify key business challenges and opportunities, designing customized analytical solutions to address their specific business needs.
• Deliver clear and compelling presentations and reports to communicate findings and recommendations to diverse audiences, including executives, clinicians, and technical teams, fostering understanding and driving actionable outcomes.
• Utilize the ClosedLoop platform to clean and validate diverse healthcare data sets, including but not limited to claims, medical records, laboratory results, and ADT information, ensuring data integrity and reliability.
• Provide training and guidance to customer data scientists, equipping them with best practices and methodologies tailored specifically for data science healthcare.

Qualifications & Skills
• Bachelor's degree or higher in a quantitative field such as statistics, computer science, mathematics, or a related discipline, with a focus on healthcare applications.
• Demonstrated experience in applying data science techniques to healthcare datasets, including proficiency in Python and SQL.
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to translate complex healthcare challenges into well-defined analytical tasks and deliver actionable insights and recommendations.
• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with experience presenting technical findings to non-technical stakeholders and tailoring messaging to different audiences.

Bonus Qualifications
• Expertise in advanced statistical methodologies tailored for healthcare applications, such as pharmaceutical medical economics or actuarial experience
• Completion of a Master's or Ph.D. program in computer science or a healthcare-related field, indicating a solid foundation in both technical and domain-specific knowledge.
• Experience working effectively in multidisciplinary teams fostering positive client relationships.

Why ClosedLoop:
• Competitive salary
• Equity
• 100% company-paid health insurance for medical, dental, and vision for employees and their families
• HSA & FSA options
• Short & long-term disability
• Life insurance
• 401k plan
• Flexible PTO
• Parental leave
• Remote work

Employee Testimonials:
• "Exciting place to work! - Company has a great vision for the role of machine learning (and AI) in healthcare. Exciting to go to work every morning!"
• "Work Hard and Feel Rewarded - ClosedLoop’s executive leadership has total faith in their team, and the employees ideas and opinions are highly respected and listened to. The passion for our company's mission is contagious from the executive team, which makes our high standards fair and rewarding."
• "Room to thrive"
• "Passionate People, Supportive Environment, & Strong Vision"

Please note that applicants must be eligible to work for any U.S.-based employer. ClosedLoop is unable to offer sponsorship of an employment visa at this time.

ClosedLoop participates in the federal E-Verify program.

ClosedLoop is an equal opportunity employer and welcomes applications from individuals of all backgrounds. If you need assistance or an accommodation due to a disability, please contact us at talent@closedloop.ai.
